DOC.brief_summary: The gold standard treatment ureteropelvic junction obstruction ( UPJO ) open pyeloplasty . As minimally invasive alternative , many center currently offer laparoscopic pyeloplasty ( LP ) primary therapy UPJOs . Recent data show laparoscopic pyeloplasty comparable success rate open pyeloplasties produce durable result . The researcher compile registry database review outcomes laparoscopic pyeloplasty patient .
DOC.criteria: Male female patient Methodist Urology Indianapolis , IN age 18 ureteropelvic junction obstruction Patients unable give inform consent Patients active bleeding diatheses Women pregnant pregnancy status confirm Patients medical condition preclude laparoscopy Patients active urinary tract infection
